title: Our national heritage: the living pattern
creator_credit: Pilot Films, National Benzole, Ralph Keene and John Taylor
brief_description: Britain’s wildlife is the theme of this film. It shows most of the principal surviving wild animals in Britain, then the work of the Nature Conservancy in preserving them in nature reserves and elsewhere, and in carrying out ecological research.
creator_credit_for_label: Pilot Films, National Benzole, Ralph Keene and John Taylor
